1.title: Python for Beginners - Full Course
1.description: Complete Python programming course covering basics to advanced topics. Learn data structures, OOP, and more.

2.title: Machine Learning Specialization
2.description: Andrew Ng's complete ML course. Covers supervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning fundamentals.

3.title: React - The Complete Guide
3.description: Master React.js from basics to advanced. Build modern web applications with hooks, context, and Redux.

4.title: SQL for Data Analysis
4.description: Learn SQL queries, joins, aggregations, and database design. Perfect for data analysts and developers.

5.title: Deep Learning Specialization
5.description: Advanced deep learning course covering CNNs, RNNs, transformers. Build neural networks from scratch.

6.title: JavaScript - The Complete Guide
6.description: Modern JavaScript ES6+ course. Learn async programming, DOM manipulation, and web APIs.

7.title: Node.js Backend Development
7.description: Build scalable backend APIs with Node.js and Express. Learn authentication, databases, and deployment.

8.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
8.description: Introduction to AWS cloud services. Learn EC2, S3, Lambda, and cloud architecture fundamentals.

9.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
9.description: Master DSA for coding interviews. Arrays, trees, graphs, dynamic programming with Python/Java.

10.title: Web Development Bootcamp
10.description: Full stack web development course. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB.

11.title: DevOps with Docker and Kubernetes
11.description: Learn containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes. CI/CD pipelines and deployment.

12.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
12.description: Learn user interface and experience design. Figma, wireframing, prototyping, and user research.

13.title: Cybersecurity Basics
13.description: Introduction to information security. Network security, encryption, ethical hacking, and best practices.

14.title: Java Programming Masterclass
14.description: Complete Java course from basics to advanced. OOP, collections, multithreading, and Spring framework.

15.title: Data Science with Python
15.description: Learn data analysis with Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib. Statistical analysis and machine learning basics.
